mapper.select: SELECT adg.id id, adg.tenant_id tenantId, adg.dept_group_code deptGroupCode, adg.description description, adg.company_id companyId, adg.enabled enabled, adg.deleted deleted, adg.created_date createdDate, adg.created_by createdBy, adg.last_updated_date lastUpdatedDate, adg.last_updated_by lastUpdatedBy FROM sys_department ad, sys_department_group adg, sys_department_group_detail adgd WHERE ad.department_code=#{departmentCode} AND ad.id=adgd.department_id AND adgd.department_group_id=adg.id AND adg.tenant_id=ad.tenant_id AND ad.status=101 AND adgd.deleted=0 AND adg.deleted=0

SELECT adg.id id, adg.tenant_id tenantId, adg.dept_group_code deptGroupCode, adg.description description, adg.company_id companyId, adg.enabled enabled, adg.deleted deleted, adg.created_date createdDate, adg.created_by createdBy, adg.last_updated_date lastUpdatedDate, adg.last_updated_by lastUpdatedBy FROM sys_department ad, sys_department_group adg, sys_department_group_detail adgd WHERE ad.id=#{departmentId} AND ad.id=adgd.department_id AND adgd.department_group_id=adg.id AND adg.tenant_id=ad.tenant_id AND ad.status=101 AND adgd.deleted=0 AND adg.deleted=0 AND adg.enabled=1

SELECT ad.department_code departmentCode, ad.name NAME , ad.id departmentId, adgd.id departmentDetailId FROM sys_department ad, sys_department_group_detail adgd WHERE ad.id=adgd.department_id AND ad.tenant_id=adgd.tenant_id AND adgd.deleted= 0 AND ad.status IN (101, 102) AND adgd.department_group_id = #{departmentGroupId} ORDER BY ad.department_code

SELECT ad.department_code departmentCode, ad.name NAME , ad.id departmentId, adgd.id departmentDetailId FROM sys_department ad, sys_department_group_detail adgd WHERE ad.id=adgd.department_id AND ad.status=101 AND ad.tenant_id=adgd.tenant_id AND adgd.deleted= 0 AND adgd.department_group_id = #{departmentGroupId}

SELECT d.department_code departmentCode, d.name NAME , d.id departmentId FROM sys_department d WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT d.department_code departmentCode, d.name NAME , d.id departmentId, adgd.id departmentDetailId FROM sys_department_group adg, sys_department_group_detail adgd WHERE adg.id = adgd.department_group_id AND adgd.department_group_id = #{departmentGroupId} AND adgd.department_id = d.id AND d.tenant_id=adg.tenant_id AND adgd.deleted= 0 ) AND d.tenant_id=#{tenantId} AND d.status=101 ORDER BY d.status ,d.department_code ASC

SELECT d.department_code departmentCode, d.name NAME , d.id departmentId FROM sys_department d WHERE d.tenant_id=#{tenantId}
and d.department_code LIKE concat('%', concat(#{deptGroupCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
and d.name LIKE concat('%', concat(#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT d.department_code departmentCode, d.name NAME , d.id departmentId FROM sys_department_group adg, sys_department_group_detail adgd WHERE adg.id = adgd.department_group_id AND adgd.department_group_id =#{departmentGroupId} AND adgd.department_id = d.id AND d.tenant_id=adg.tenant_id AND adgd.deleted= 0 ) ORDER BY d.status ,d.department_code ASC
SELECT d.department_oid departmentOid, d.department_code departmentCode, d.name NAME , d.id departmentId, d.path path FROM sys_department d WHERE d.id=#{departmentId} AND d.status=101

SELECT d.department_code departmentCode, d.name NAME , d.id departmentId FROM sys_department d WHERE d.tenant_id=#{tenantId} AND d.status=101
AND d.company_id = #{companyId}
AND d.department_code LIKE concat('%', concat(#{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
AND d.NAME LIKE concat('%', concat(#{deptDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
ORDER BY d.department_code

select ad.department_code departmentCode, ad.name NAME , ad.id departmentId, ad.department_oid departmentOid from sys_department_user adu, sys_department ad WHERE adu.user_id = ( SELECT user_id FROM sys_contact WHERE user_oid = #{empOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AND adu.department_id = ad.id AND ad.status=101
SELECT d.department_code departmentCode, d.name NAME , d.id departmentId FROM sys_department d WHERE d.tenant_id=#{tenantId} AND d.status = 101

SELECT adg.id id, adg.tenant_id tenantId, adg.dept_group_code deptGroupCode, adg.description description, adg.company_id companyId, adg.enabled enabled, adg.deleted deleted, adg.created_date createdDate, adg.created_by createdBy, adg.last_updated_date lastUpdatedDate, adg.last_updated_by lastUpdatedBy FROM sys_department_group adg WHERE adg.tenant_id = #{tenantId}
AND adg.dept_group_code LIKE concat('%', concat(#{deptGroupCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
AND adg.description LIKE concat('%', concat(#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
ORDER BY adg.enabled DESC,adg.dept_group_code ASC

select ad.department_code departmentCode, ad.name NAME , ad.id departmentId, ad.department_oid departmentOid from sys_department ad, sys_company ac, sys_tenant at WHERE ad.tenant_id=at.id AND ac.tenant_id=at.id AND ac.id=ad.company_id AND ac.id=#{companyId} AND at.id=#{tenantId} AND ad.department_code = #{deptCode}

SELECT c.id id, c.company_code companyCode, c.name name FROM sys_company c WHERE c.set_of_books_id = #{setOfBooksId} AND c.enabled = 1
AND c.company_code LIKE concat('%', concat(#{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
AND c.name LIKE concat('%', concat(#{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))

SELECT c.id id, c.company_code companyCode, c.name name FROM sys_company c WHERE c.set_of_books_id = #{setOfBooksId} AND c.enabled = 1
AND c.company_code = #{companyCode}

SELECT adg.id id, adg.tenant_id tenantId, adg.dept_group_code deptGroupCode, adg.description description, adg.company_id companyId, adg.enabled enabled, adg.deleted deleted, adg.created_date createdDate, adg.created_by createdBy, adg.last_updated_date lastUpdatedDate, adg.last_updated_by lastUpdatedBy FROM sys_department_group adg WHERE adg.tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND adg.enabled = 1
AND adg.dept_group_code LIKE concat('%', concat(#{deptGroupCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
AND adg.description LIKE concat('%', concat(#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
ORDER BY adg.dept_group_code

select ad.name NAME , ad.id departmentId, ad.path path, ad.department_code departmentCode, ad.department_oid departmentOid from sys_department ad WHERE ad.tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND ad.status=101
AND ad.department_code LIKE concat('%', concat(#{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
AND ad.name LIKE concat('%', concat(#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
AND (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sys_department dd WHERE dd.parent_id = ad.id and dd.status!=103) = 0
ORDER BY ad.department_code

select ad.department_code departmentCode, ad.name NAME , ad.id id, ad.path path, ad.department_oid departmentOid from sys_department ad WHERE ad.tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND ad.status=101
AND ad.department_code LIKE concat('%', concat(#{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
AND ad.name LIKE concat('%', concat(#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
ORDER BY ad.department_code

select ad.department_code departmentCode, ad.name NAME , ad.id departmentId, ad.department_oid departmentOid from sys_department ad WHERE ad.tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND ad.status=101 AND ad.department_code = #{code}

SELECT c.user_id userId, c.user_oid userOid, c.full_name userName, c.employee_id userCode, com.name companyName FROM sys_contact c, sys_company com WHERE c.tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND c.company_id = com.id
AND c.company_id = #{companyId}
AND c.user_id IN (SELECT user_id from sys_department_user WHERE department_id = #{departmentId})
AND c.employee_id LIKE concat('%', concat(#{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
AND c.full_name LIKE concat('%', concat(#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
AND com.name LIKE concat('%', concat(#{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))

SELECT a.id id, a.contact_bank_account_oid contactBankAccountOid , a.user_oid userOid, a.bank_account_no bankAccountNo, a.bank_account_name bankAccountName, a.bank_name bankName, a.branch_name branchName, a.account_location accountLocation, a.is_primary isPrimary, a.enabled, a.bank_code bankCode FROM sys_contact_bank_account a, sys_contact c WHERE a.user_oid = c.user_oid AND c.company_id = #{companyId} AND a.enabled= 1
AND c.full_name LIKE concat('%', concat(#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
ORDER BY c.full_name

SELECT a.id id, a.contact_bank_account_oid contactBankAccountOid , a.user_oid userOid, a.bank_account_no bankAccountNo, a.bank_account_name bankAccountName, a.bank_name bankName, a.branch_name branchName, a.account_location accountLocation, a.is_primary isPrimary, a.enabled, a.bank_code bankCode FROM sys_contact_bank_account a, sys_contact c WHERE a.user_oid = c.user_oid AND a.user_oid = #{userOid} AND a.enabled= 1 ORDER BY a.bank_account_no

SELECT c.user_oid FROM sys_contact c
WHERE c.tenant_id = #{tenantId}
AND ( c.full_name LIKE concat('%', concat(#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')) OR c.employee_id LIKE concat('%', concat(#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')) )
AND c.user_id IN ( SELECT contact.user_id from sys_contact contact WHERE contact.company_id IN ( SELECT companyId.id from sys_company companyId WHERE companyId.set_of_books_id = #{setOfBooksId} ) )
ORDER BY c.employee_id

SELECT c.user_oid FROM sys_contact c
WHERE c.tenant_id = #{tenantId}
AND c.employee_id LIKE concat('%', concat(#{key ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
AND c.full_name LIKE concat('%', concat(#{name ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
AND c.user_id IN ( SELECT users.user_id from sys_contact users WHERE users.company_id IN ( SELECT companyId.id from sys_company companyId WHERE companyId.set_of_books_id = #{setOfBooksId} ) )
ORDER BY c.employee_id

SELECT a.id id, a.contact_bank_account_oid contactBankAccountOid , a.user_oid userOid, a.bank_account_no bankAccountNo, a.bank_account_name bankAccountName, a.bank_name bankName, a.branch_name branchName, a.account_location accountLocation, a.primary, a.enabled, a.bank_code bankCode FROM sys_contact_bank_account a, sys_contact c WHERE a.user_oid = c.user_oid AND c.user_id = #{userId} AND a.enabled=TRUE ORDER BY a.bank_account_no

select ad.department_code departmentCode, ad.name NAME , ad.id departmentId, ad.department_oid departmentOid from sys_department_user adu, sys_department ad WHERE adu.user_id = #{empId} AND adu.department_id = ad.id AND ad.status=101
